{include "affiliate_loader"} Join us for our virtual annual fundraiser to protect civil liberties in Minnesota. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}
RSVP NOW

{include "default_salutation"} –

As national, statewide, and local political campaigns reach a fever pitch, we know that our supporters' attention is laser-focused on the upcoming election.

But with threats to our civil rights and liberties also looming large, we cannot afford to lose sight of critical issues like ongoing police brutality, shrinking access to legal abortion, and the restriction of our voting rights. These are outright attacks on liberty, justice and equity, and it will take all of us, together, to beat them back.

Right now, we have to fight on all fronts at once, and we need you beside us.

Our ask is small, {include "first_name"}, but the impact of your action will be huge. Will you tune in on Tuesday, October 6, at 4:30 p.m. to our annual fundraiser, Fulfill Liberty's Promise?

Learn about recent lawsuits on behalf of Minnesota protesters, journalists, and voters. Listen to former Minnesota Twins pitcher LaTroy Hawkins, popular sports reporter and analyst Lea B. Olsen, and players from the Minnesota Lynx and Timberwolves share why they're pledging to be voters. And enjoy a performance from local musician Jeremy Messersmith.

We're asking our most committed supporters to take another step and choose a way to get involved in Fulfill Liberty's Promise:

  • Share our live virtual program with your friends and family by hosting a Watch Party on Facebook. Learn how to become an advocate. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, youtube.com.
  • A generous donor has offered us $25,000 to match every donation we receive after we hit $100,000. Help us unlock this match by making a donation when you register for the event.
  • Become a sponsor of Fulfill Liberty's Promise for as little as $100.
  • Bid on the exciting items and experiences in our silent auction. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, 32auctions.com.

We need every single person beside us in the urgent fight for liberty, justice, and equity. Please join us on Tuesday, October 6, for Fulfill Liberty's Promise, and help us stay strong and effective as protectors of civil liberties in Minnesota.

Visit us on Facebook to learn more about the event and how you can get involved.

See you on Tuesday,

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
